comments:
3.0 RC1

Not sure when this started happening.

I use recent builds of Eclipse 3.0 (not sure if I used RC1) without any
problems. Veronika, could some more info? How far does it go, what error
messages are produced, is there any log in the configuration area
(<timestamp>.log) or workspace?

You may also want to try running with:

cd <ECLIPSE_HOME>
<JAVA_HOME>/bin/java -cp startup.jar <your other VM args>
org.eclipse.core.launcher.Main <your other Eclipse args>

If it is a VM crash, that should show it.

I get an error dialog that says "Framework not found" but no error log.

I will try the way described in comment #1.

Get:

java.lang.RuntimeException: Could not find framework
   at org.eclipse.runtime.core.launcher.Main.getBootPath(Main.java:357)
   ...

Managed to get eclipse to start.

Apparently, I can not share the same eclipse installation between Windows NT 
and Windows 98 - even if they use completely different workspaces.  Must be a 
file system thing.  Sorry about that, I guess I will just close this bug 
report.
